name: The Weekly Quiz Game Beta
description:
Welcome to The Weekly Quiz Game Beta Overview and Download page!

Answer Weird, Absurd, Quirky, or just straight trivia in my second self-developed game and first 2D game! I'm excited to try out a new type of genre and style of game!

the full game will be out on November 13, 2022. I will keep V0.9.9 on this beta page, not the archive page.

11/13/22: Because my school blocks itch.io, I will be delaying the release of TWQG to 11/20/22, the quiz will be the same though.

happy answering!
